name: Dungeon Slide
description:
Dungeon Slide Made by @DotSquareGames for Ludum Dare 48 SLIDE DEEPER AND DEEPER IN A TINY DUNGEON FULL OF MONSTERS! WHAT IS IT? 

- A tiny dungeon crawler/puzzle game where you can only slide from a wall to another to move

- Go deeper and deeper in a dungeon full of monsters to fight

- The number of tiles you cover defines your attack power

- Kill ennemies by having more attack power than they have shield

- Features 9 levels, for about 15 minutes of gameplay

- This game was made under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48 - more like a day and a half 'cause I began very late :(

- Available on Windows and MacOS

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME?

- Use arrows to move

- Press space to reset the level

- Press escape to quit the dungeon

- You can only slide from a wall to another

- The number of tiles you cover when you move define your momentum (aka your attack score)

- You can kill monsters by having more momentum (attack score) than they have shield (the numbers above their heads)

- Have fun and thanks for playing!

You can follow me on twitter if you like my work (sorry for the shameless self-promotion -_-') : https://twitter.com/DotSquareGames
